original: Eckerberg, Per August Konrad, rektor, Visingsö, f. 30/9/84 i Huskvar- na av Per Johan E. o. Selma Larm. G. 12 m. Elin Magnusson. Barn: Per f. 13. — Mog:ex. i Lund 05, folkskoll :-ex. 06, akad. stud. 10-12, div. fackl. fortb :kurser. Lär. v. Sthlms folksk. 06-09, Arlövs h. folksk. o. folksk. 10-20, rektor o. ämneslär. v. Visingsö h. folksk. sed. 20. Ordf. i komm:stäm-ma, tax:nd, arbetslösh :komm., elektr. distrib: för en., v. ordf. i skolråd, led. av komm:fullm. o. komm:nd, förest, f. föreläsn :fören., riksantikv. ombud m. m. Utg.: Karta över Visingsö m. notiser t. öns fornminnen, Kronorod-den o. paquetbåten mellan Visingsö o. Brahe-Gränna samt ett flertal polemiska art. om Visingsö Skolegods-fond, utfört vetensk. undersökn. av abrasionen kring Visingsö. Hobby: fiske.
translated: Eckerberg, Per August Konrad, principal, Visingsö, b. September 30th, 1884 in Huskvarna to Per Johan E. and Selma Larm. Married for 12 years to Elin Magnusson. Children: Per, born in 1913. He was a former student at Lund in 1905, completed his elementary school teacher education in 1906, attended academic studies from 1910-1912, and later attended various specialized courses. He worked as a teacher at Stockholm's elementary schools from 1906-1909, at Arlöv's higher elementary school and elementary school from 1910-1920, and as a principal and subject teacher at Visingsö's higher elementary school since 1920. He served as chairman of the municipal council meetings, tax boards, unemployment committee, and electrical distribution company, as well as vice chairman of the school board, member of the municipal assembly and council, and chairman of the lecture association. He also held positions as a national antiquities representative and more. He published a map of Visingsö with notes about the island's antiquities, as well as several polemical articles about the Visingsö School Endowment Fund, a scientific investigation of the abrasion around Visingsö, and his hobby is fishing.
